member.name: T:SharpKit.Web.Server.Handlers.SourceMapsHandler
member.summary:
Handler that helps supporting the JsExport.GenerateSourceMaps feature Specifies to generate chrome source maps, which enables debugging of JavaScript in C#. To enable this feature you must add a handler in your web.config file:
<add name="SourceMapsHandler" type="SharpKit.Web.Server.Handlers.SourceMapsHandler, SharpKit.Web" verb="*" path="SourceMaps.ashx" />
And enable source maps in chrome: show development bar, click options wheel, check enable source maps.
